params._amount: Token amount in native representation to deposit.
params._from: which account to pull the tokens.
params._to: which account to push the tokens.

returns.amountOut: The deposit amount in vault shares

returns._0: The amount of `token` to be charged for the loan, on top of the returned principal.

params._data: Arbitrary data structure, intended to contain user-defined parameters.
params._receiver: The receiver of the tokens in the loan, and the receiver of the callback.

returns._0: The amount of `token` that can be borrowed.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Proxiable UUID marker function.      This would help to avoid wrong logic contract to be used for upgrading.

toShare(address,uint256,bool).details: Helper function to represent an `amount` of `token` in shares.

params._ceil: If to ceil the amount or not

returns.share: The token amount represented in shares.

returns.amount: The share amount back into native representation.

params._from: which user to pull the tokens.
params._to: which user to push the tokens.

updateFlashloanRate(uint256).details: Update the flashloan rate charged, only blacksmith team can call

params._from: which user to pull the tokens.
params._to: which user to push the tokens.

approveContract(address,address,bool,uin.notice: approve a contract to enable the contract to withdraw

balanceOf(address,address).notice: mapping of token asset to user address and balance

flashFee(address,uint256).notice: The fee to be charged for a given loan.

flashLoanRate().notice: the flashloan rate to charge for flash loans

maxFlashLoan(address).notice: The amount of currency available to be lent.

owner().notice: the address that access to perform `admin` functions

toUnderlying(address,uint256).notice: Helper function represent shares back into the `token` amount.

totals(address).notice: mapping of token asset to total deposit

transfer(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Transfer share of `token` to another account

transferToNewOwner(address).notice: Transfer control from current owner address to another

userApprovalNonce(address).notice: mapping of user to approval nonce

userApprovedContracts(address,address).notice: mapping of user to contract to approval status

withdraw(address,address,address,uint256.notice: Withdraw the underlying share of `token` from a user account.

userdoc.notice: Vault contract stores assets deposited into the Lending pairs. It enables deposit, withdrawal, flashloans and transfer of tokens. It represents the deposited token amount in form of shares This contract implements the EIP3156 IERC3156FlashBorrower for flashloans.
